about_the_game: Finally Farmer’s Life, let’s taste some! Join Kasimir and his faithful pig Fluffy on the very first of their many adventures. Get through some randomly picked days and events from our game. To begin with, get to know our main character and his surroundings to eventually plow a small, nearby field. On another day, you will experience a crazy, drunk ride on the bike. Enjoy the blurry views as you try to reach your farmyard. Last but not least , you will have to face a dangerous, destructive storm. Save what can be saved but be prepared to suffer losses. Survive and repair what has been damaged! We encourage you to take a small bite and grow your appetite for much more!
